overview: Bellator 183: Henderson vs. Pitbull took place on September 23, 2017 at the SAP Center in San Jose, California. The event aired live in prime time on Spike TV.  The main event featured a Lightweight bout between Benson Henderson and Patricky Freire.  Also occurring on the show is Bellator Kickboxing 7 headlined by bantamweight title bout between Kevin Ross and Domenico Lomurno.
title: Bellator 183: Henderson vs. Pitbull
